name: Opera Bookmarks File
summary: An ADR file contains a list of saved bookmarks created by version 12 or earlier of the Opera web browser. It stores URL links to websites users have chosen to save for quick access later, including the website address and the title displayed in the browser. ADR files allow users to export and import their bookmarks to transfer favorite sites between different devices or Opera installations or back them up.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
